name: Expand Aura
prereq: You Have At Least One Aura From A Champion Feat Or Feature.
summary: You focus your divine power to extend your influence.
description:
You focus your divine power to extend your influence. Select one aura you have from a champion feat or feature, such as Aura of Courage or Aura of Life. The radius of the aura is doubled until the start of your next turn.Traits

Concentrate: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.
